item.title: Stock Price Simulation
item.description: In this post, I’ll introduce four stochastic processes commonly used to simulate stock prices. Formulation and Python implementation are presented one by one, with brief comments afterwards. Before introducing the four methods, we first define a handy function to prepend a zero before a numpy array: def prepend(arr, val=0): return np.pad(arr, (1, 0), mode='constant', constant_values=val) Brownian Motion Brownian motion (BM) was initially exhibited and modeled in gas or liquid particle movements.

Parameter Estimation of Brownian Motions by Method of Moments
